title: Oil Price Generator
creator: Bruno St-Aubin
description: This atomic model periodically generates a new value for oil prices that is propagated to linked models.
subject: oil
gis
simple
economic

state.description: This model only holds the current oil price in its state

field.name: barrel price
field.description: The current price of an oil barrel

title: Oil GDP Cell
creator: Bruno St-Aubin
description: This atomic model represents a grid cell of 1km by 1 km in Alberta. It calculates the GST using a linear regression and the price of an oil barrel. GST is used as a proxy for GDP.
subject: oil
gis
simple
economic

state.description: This model stores the current price of an oil barrel and the current GST value.

field.name: barrel price
field.description: The current price of an oil barrel

field.name: GDP (GST)
field.description: GST for the cell given the current oil barrel price

field.name: barrel price
field.description: The current price of an oil barrel
